body:
Use this service to make a claim for expenses as a defence witness.

You can make a claim for:

* travel costs to and from court
* accommodation, if you stayed overnight
* meals and refreshments
* loss of earnings or childcare costs

components.html: To make a claim for loss of earnings, you'll need to ask for a signed letter from your employer which shows your daily income.

extraComponents.html: Find out [how HM Courts and Tribunals Service uses personal information](https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/hm-courts-and-tribunals-service/about/personal-information-charter).

heading: Make a claim for expenses as a defence witness
